sent.orig: I accuse my boss, too accuse you, whoever you are.
sent.trans: 我的老板也包括在内，还有你——不管你是谁。

sent.orig: I do not accuse heaven, nor do i lay the blame on men.
sent.trans: 不怨天，不尤人，下学而上达。

sent.orig: Make sure of your facts before you accuse him.
sent.trans: 在指责他以前要把材料核实一下。

sent.orig: Western nations accuse Iran of seeking nuclear weapons -- a charge that Tehran denies.
sent.trans: 西方国家指责伊朗寻求核武器，而伊朗否认。

sent.orig: We don't want to accuse anyone unjustly.
